tooltip.lmod.noshift: Hold down§6 SHIFT KEY§f for more information.
tooltip.lmod.block.permanent_empower:
Right click the block while holding the tough dust 
item to convert it into a powerful form.
I wonder what happens if I step on this block...
tooltip.lmod.item.dust_empower:
Right click on an obsidian block 
at the height limit (y = 320) while holding some
tough powder to convert it into a more powerful 
version. 
NOTE: You will sacrifice the obsidian though.
tooltip.lmod.item.duracell: Will you take the risk of eating batteries?
